Full_Title: Monteverde
Title: Monteverde
Author: Mildred Mendenhall
Review: I had fairly low expectations of this pamphlet, if I'm being honest, but I was wrong, and very glad I read it. I somehow expected a pamphlet to be slightly fanatical or romantic. It was not only deeply rooted in Quaker history but a touching testimony of a family over a couple of generations living in a country foreign to them, a fascinating accounting of their challenges and triumphs.
